content: What is this "parallel" tactic combinator called? Do we have that in mathlib4 or std4 already? I don't even know what it's called which makes it a bit hard to search for.
I believe it's literally just list, and the implementation is docs#tactic.andthen_seq_focus; but maybe there really is special parser support
Okay, thanks, we'll have to implement this
There is an implementation of this in mathlib4 IIRC
